using Oxygen.Editor.Data;
using Oxygen.Editor.Data.Settings;
using System;
using System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using Testing.Testing.Types;

#nullable enable

namespace Testing;
public sealed partial class MultiSettings
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Setting descriptors for MultiSettings properties.
    /// </summary>
    internal static class Descriptors
    {
        public static readonly SettingDescriptor<string> Name = new()
        {
            Key = new SettingKey<string>(ModuleName, nameof(Name)),
            DisplayName = null,
            Description = null,
            Category = null,
            Validators = new ValidationAttribute[] {  },
        };
        public static readonly SettingDescriptor<int> Age = new()
        {
            Key = new SettingKey<int>(ModuleName, nameof(Age)),
            DisplayName = null,
            Description = null,
            Category = null,
            Validators = new ValidationAttribute[] {  },
        };
        public static readonly SettingDescriptor<MyComplexType> Value = new()
        {
            Key = new SettingKey<MyComplexType>(ModuleName, nameof(Value)),
            DisplayName = null,
            Description = null,
            Category = null,
            Validators = new ValidationAttribute[] {  },
        };
    }
}

/// <summary>
/// Assembly-level module initializer that registers all descriptors for this assembly on load.
/// </summary>
file static class DescriptorsInitializer
{
    [System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ModuleInitializer]
    internal static void Initialize()
    {
        EditorSettingsManager.StaticProvider.Register(Testing.MultiSettings.Descriptors.Name);
        EditorSettingsManager.StaticProvider.Register(Testing.MultiSettings.Descriptors.Age);
        EditorSettingsManager.StaticProvider.Register(Testing.MultiSettings.Descriptors.Value);
    }
}
